QuestData.Title: Love's Labor
QuestData.Description: Can I trouble you for another favor?$B$BWe're way behind schedule, and this jade shipment is the last we need to finish the great statue.$B$BI've got my hands full, so could you run this ore over to the other foremen?$B$BHistorian Dinh, Surveyor Sawa, and Kitemaster Shoku can all be found around the base of the statue. Taskmaster Emi is directing production at the top of the statue.$B$BWe're on a deadline, so make sure you do it fast! Time's a wasting!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the jade to Historian Dinh, Surveyor Sawa, Kitemaster Shoku, and Taskmaster Emi.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you deliver the jade in time?
QuestData.RewardText: What, done already? You're quite the runner, $c. You ever thought about making a living out of this?
